creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of Kenji Nakahashi and in honor of Robert Cozzolino
description: back of head and shoulders of a man with two rectangles around his head, and the mat opening forming a third rectangle, each stamped with numbers 1-3; 4 stamped in ULC of mat; diagonal lines extending from LRC of smallest rectangle to ULC of each of the 4 rectangles; 19-3/4" long piece of black thread extending down from LRC of mat, with a square paper tape tab attached to bottom
dimension:
10 15/16 × 8 1/2 in. (27.78 × 21.59 cm) (sheet)
14 × 10 in. (35.56 × 25.4 cm) (mount)
19 3/4 in. (50.17 cm) (object part, black thread at LRC on mat)
medium: Ink and pencil on paper, black thread
title: Untitled
